author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013420

In Bee Simulator: The Hive, you'll get to live the epic adventure of a tiny bee in a vast world! Collect pollen, race through jet streams, and protect your hive from wasps. Now even bigger with The Hive expansion - gather resources, build and customize your very own beehive!

Out now PS4 and PS5!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #beesimulator
title: Bee Simulator: The Hive - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
title: Two masks connecting / Courier and katana / Explorer's reward 🎭

author: PlayStation
description:
Available for PlayStation™ VR2 from November 27, 2025.

B4T Games, in partnership with Peyo Company, brings you a NEW three roller coaster bundle,  the “Epic Roller Coasters: The Smurfs” DLC, which will take you to the smurftastic village of our beloved little blue friends.

You'll embark on a three-chapter adventure, where each special ride will send you on a different leg of this magical journey.

You'll begin by delivering blueberries to our beloved blue friends in a special cart built by Handy.

Secondly, you'll try to thwart the plans of the evil Gargamel and his cat Azrael to capture the residents of Smurf Village.

And finally, you'll embark on a daring rescue from the villain's lair to free our beloved Papa Smurf from the clutches of evil and ensure a happy Smurf ending for everyone.

The "Epic Roller Coasters: The Smurfs" DLC consists of three themed roller coasters, three blasters for shooter mode, and a special smurf cart.

The DLC can be played in Classic, Shooter, and Rac
title: Epic Roller Coasters - The Smurfs Trailer | PS VR2 Games
